widgets_values:
# LF_WallOfText

### Summary
The LF_WallOfText node generates a wall of text by concatenating input strings, optionally shuffling them, and sending the result to the PromptServer.

---

## ðŸ“¥ Inputs

| Parameter      | Type     | Default Value | Description |
|----------------|----------|---------------|-------------|
| separator      | STRING   | ", "          | Character(s) separating each string apart. |
| text_1         | STRING   | ""            | The first required string. |
| text_2         | STRING   | ""            | The second required string. |
| text_3-10      | STRING   | ""            | The third to tenth optional strings. |
| shuffle_inputs | BOOLEAN  | False         | Toggle shuffling of input strings. |
| seed           | INTEGER  | 42            | Seed to control the randomness of the shuffling. |
| ui_widget     | LF_CODE  | ""            | Custom UI widget for node configuration. |
| node_id       | STRING   | UNIQUE_ID     | Node ID (hidden input). |

---

## ðŸ“¤ Outputs

| Output Name    | Type     | Description |
|----------------|----------|-------------|
| string         | STRING   | The generated wall of text. |
| string_list    | STRING   | The generated wall of text (always returns a single string). |

---

## ðŸ”§ Execution Details

- **Category**: {CATEGORY}
- **Function Name**: `{FUNCTION}`
- **Execution Method**: `on_exec`
- **Unique Features**: Shuffling of input strings, customizable separator, and optional UI widget for node configuration.

---

### ðŸ“ Example Output
```json
{
    "string": "Hello, world! Foo bar baz qux"
}
```
Note: The actual output will depend on the input values and shuffling configuration.
